title: TGaceAllStories

items.title: Off-price retailer Ross flashes another sign that consumers are seeking discounts this fall

items.title: I’m single, 75, and living with kidney disease and a pacemaker. I’ve no long-term care insurance. Will I be OK?
items.description: “My income is $120,000 per year which includes $60,000 in Social Security and a pension.”

items.title: The good news is we got an $800K windfall. The bad news is it came after a layoff. What do we do with it?
items.description: This couple, still in their 50s, are thinking about a vacation home and investing.

items.title: ‘I’ve been kept in poverty’: Do I take a $70K job at 74 and lose my Section 8 housing allowance?
items.description: “After the age of 50, I really only had sporadic contract work and I had to sell my house.”
